org.apache.james.imap.encode.base
Class ImapResponseComposerImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.james.api.imap.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.james.imap.encode.base.ImapResponseComposerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImapConstants, ImapResponseComposer
public class ImapResponseComposerImpl
extends AbstractLogEnabled
implements ImapConstants, ImapResponseComposer

Class providing methods to send response messages from the server to the client.

nillableComposition

public ImapResponseComposer nillableComposition(java.lang.String masterQuote,
                                                java.lang.String[] quotes)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: ImapResponseComposer
Composes a nillable composition. When the master quote is null, NIL is appended. Otherwise, a parenthesized list is created starting with the master quote. When the quotes are null, NIL is appended only. Otherwise, each element is appended in sequence as per ImapResponseComposer.nillableQuote(String)

Specified by:
nillableComposition in interface ImapResponseComposer
quotes - quotes, possibly null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

nillableQuotes

public ImapResponseComposer nillableQuotes(java.lang.String[] quotes)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: ImapResponseComposer
Composes a sequence of nillables quotes. When messages are null, a single NIL is appended. Otherwise, each element is appended in sequence as per ImapResponseComposer.nillableQuote(String).

Specified by:
nillableQuotes in interface ImapResponseComposer
Parameters:
quotes - messages, possibly null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

upperCaseAscii

public ImapResponseComposer upperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: ImapResponseComposer
Appends the given message after conversion to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII.

Specified by:
upperCaseAscii in interface ImapResponseComposer
Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Returns:
self, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException
